p: The authors of this paper evaluated the major causative factors which were found to be influential in the repeated emergence of pandemics in the context of COVID 19. Although, there are several studies suggesting the pandemic emergence and anthropogenic causes; there is an urgent need to use an integrative analytical approach to mathematically model the inter-relationships and dependency of factors to be able to prioritize them more effectively in order to take necessary actions to prevent future emergence of infectious diseases ( EIDs).
